item.title: Don't forget to take advantage of your 401k match and ensure you receive all of your money!
item.description:
Dynamics GP has become much better at managing typical 401(k) matching scenarios. However, due to the various components involved, a breakdown might be useful. Let’s illustrate with a 50% match up to 5% scenario, where the employer matches half of the employee’s contribution, but only up to 5% of their gross wages. Achieving this requires setting up both a deduction (for the employee’s contribution) and a benefit (for the employer match)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/don-t-forget-to-take-advantage-of-your-401k-match-and-ensure-you-receive-all-of-your-money/
